name: A Giant's Life
description:
A collaboration submission between Chromatic and Ashenjade for VR Jam 2021.

You are a peaceful giant visiting a tranquil city. You are also very clumsy... Don't worry, they really should have built that thing better anyways!

Romp through the city, throw cars. Don't eat the giant food. Your best friends "love clubs" and "sicky" can be found somewhere in the city.

Created in 3 days.

Should run with anything compatible with SteamVR. Comment below if you have problems with your headset.

Built in Unreal Engine using the VR Expansion Plugin and POLYGON - City Pack.
